short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A crypto security tool that uses AI and community insights to protect you from scams and malicious websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Browser extension allows you to - 
1. Setup your non-custodial wallet for APTOS Blockchain
2. Submit Review for any domain/website/web3 project as NFT
3. Send APTOS
4. Archive Web Content using Review NFTs
5. Get AI Summary for any website you're visiting
